sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; const initialData = { name: 'Excessive operation', status: 'new', assignee: 'bill' } const IssueCard = ({data = initialData}) => { const [issue, setIssue] = React.useState(data) const setStatus = (status) => setIssue({...issue, status}) return (

Name: {issue.name}

Assignee: {issue.assignee}

Status: {issue.status}

Actions

) } export default IssueCard
